attributes.action: apologise for the Amritsar massacre that took place on 04/13/1919
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jallianwala Bagh massacre: Unarmed men, women and children were massacred. The firing lasted for 10 to 15 minutes by the Order of the British under the command of Brigadier-General Reginald Dyer, till they ran out of ammunition. Official British Raj sources placed the
fatalities at 379, and with 1100 wounded.Civil Surgeon Dr.Smith indicated that there were 1,526 casualties. Sir, no official apology has ever been received by the respective government. May archives pertaining Viceroy, Lord Chelmsford in this massacre be made readily available to the public. The Hunter Commission within the auspices of the freedom of information act be disclosed fully. We as a people will not lie silently until empire has taken within itself to offer a full and unrelenting apology.
